item.title: My First Post
item.description: Basics, Getting started with Netifly and Hugo. Trying to get a hugo workflow in place… To do: [x] Create a sample blog post (this file) [x] Test it out on the [local server](http://localhost:1313/) hugo server -D [x] Test the dev directory hugo server -wD -d dev [!] Test alternative code directory. (../../../../BW_PROJECTS/) NOT WORKING hugo server -wDs ~/Users/lg3/BW_MCP/BW_PUBLISH/quickstart/content -d dev hugo server -wDs ~/BW_MCP/BW_PUBLISH/content/posts -d dev hugo server -wDs ~/.
